com.github.gwtd3.api.core

Class Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.github.gwtd3.api.core.Random

  • public class Random
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    A pseudorandom number generation function.

    Random instances are created using static factory methods of this class, such as normal().

    The generate() method is then used to generate numbers.

    Author:
    Anthony Schiochet

      • irwinHall

        public static final Random irwinHall(int count)
        Returns a function for generating random number with a Irwin-Hall distribution.

        Parameters:
        count - the number of independant variables
        Returns:
        the generator

      • normal

        public static final Random normal()
        Returns a function for generating random number with a normal (Gaussian) distribution, with a mean of 0 and a deviation of 1.

        Returns:
        the generator

      • normal

        public static final Random normal(double mean)
        Returns a function for generating random number with a normal (Gaussian) distribution, with the given mean, and a deviation of 1.

        The expected value of the generated pseudorandom numbers is mean, with the standard deviation of 1.

        Parameters:
        mean - the mean
        Returns:
        the generator

      • normal

        public static final Random normal(double mean,
            double deviation)
        Returns a function for generating random number with a normal (Gaussian) distribution, with the given mean, and the given deviation.

        Parameters:
        mean - the mean
        deviation - the deviation
        Returns:
        the generator
